topic:
请帮我分析如下ctf题目 : from Crypto.Util.number import *
 p = getPrime(700)
 q = getPrime(700)
 n = p*q
 e1 = 3*getPrime(16)
 e2 = 3*getPrime(16)
 flag = b'flag{******}'
 c1 = pow(bytes_to_long(flag), e1, n)
 c2 = pow(bytes_to_long(flag), e2, n)
 print(f'n = {n}')
 print(f'e1 = {e1}')
 print(f'e2 = {e2}')
 print(f'c1 = {c1}')
 print(f'c2 = {c2}')
